query: SELECT sum(volume) AS "סה״כ היקף", sum(executed) AS "סה״כ בוצע", currency AS "מטבע", ((publisher->>0) || '/' || (purchasing_unit->>0)) AS "היחידה הרוכשת", purchase_method->>0 AS "אופן הרכישה", min(min_year)||' - '||max(max_year) AS "תקופה" FROM contract_spending WHERE entity_id=':id' AND ((:period <= min_year) OR (min_year IS NULL AND :period <= max_year)) GROUP BY 3,4,5 ORDER BY 1 DESC nulls LAST

text: כלל הפטורים ממכרז עם הארגון מ <period>
query: SELECT volume AS "סה״כ היקף", executed AS "סה״כ בוצע", exemption_reason AS "סיבה", ((publisher->>0) || '/' || (purchasing_unit->>0)) AS "היחידה הרוכשת", min_year||' - '||max_year AS "תקופה" FROM contract_spending WHERE entity_id=':id' AND (purchase_method->>0)='פטור ממכרז' AND ((:period <= min_year) OR (min_year IS NULL AND :period <= max_year)) ORDER BY 1 DESC nulls LAST

text: כלל התמיכות שהארגון קיבל ש <phase> ב <period>
query: SELECT :phase AS "שנה", supporting_ministry AS "משרד", request_type AS "סוג תמיכה", support_title AS "נושא", sum(amount_paid) as "סה״כ שולם" FROM raw_supports WHERE :phase :period AND entity_id=':id' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

text: התקנות מהן הארגון קיבל תמיכות, לפי סה״כ כספים ש<phase> עבור בקשות מ <period>
query: SELECT SUPPORT_TITLE AS "נושא", budget_code AS "מספר תקנה", sum(:phase) as "סה״כ", min(year_requested) || '-' || max(year_requested)  as "תקופה" FROM raw_supports WHERE year_requested :period AND  entity_id=':id' GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 3 DESC nulls last

SELECT volume AS "היקף", executed AS "ביצוע", currency AS "מטבע", min_year||'-'||max_year AS "תקופה", purpose AS "תיאור", purchase_method->>0 AS "אופן רכישה", ((publisher->>0) || '/' || (purchasing_unit->>0)) AS "היחידה הרוכשת", order_date AS "תאריך הזמנה", start_date AS "תאריך התחלה", end_date AS "תאריך סיום" FROM contract_spending WHERE entity_id=':id' AND ((:period BETWEEN min_year AND max_year) or (min_year is null and :period <= max_year) or (max_year is null and :period >= min_year) or (:period is null))
